name: DOOMTANK
detailed_description:
DOOMTANK is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter designed to put you in the hot seat. Enter an ever-changing room straight from the depths of Hell and slay its inhabitants.

Find and use multiple weapons and a slew of power ups to destroy the minions of hell. Equip armor to stay alive. Repair your tank. Most of all, beat your high score.

Download today and experience more than 20 levels, at least four bosses, and a whole lot of fun.
